A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The film is well executed. The story isn't. Previous subplots are resolved unsatisfactory\, characters are out of character\, some subplots are completely unnecessary (looking at you Rose and Finn)\, some drag on. 

Spoilers section
The biggest questions and anticipation characters fans had going in are completely ruined. SSnoke\, Luke\, Rey's past\, Kylo Ren\, Pho (forgot how to spell his name)\, Finn - all ruined for fans. 

If you aren't a fan\, u might like it. I am a fan\, I don't like it.

Luke's first scene where he throws away the lightsaber feels like exactly what Rian Johnson did to the Star Wars lore\, established story\, and all that. He took all we loved and threw it away like he didn't care.
